journal-title-group.journal-title: Nebraska Journal of Economics and Business

publisher.publisher-name: College of Business Administration of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln

title-group.article-title: A Regional Test of the Heckscher-Ohlin Theory of International Trade

p.mixed-citation: Bertil Ohlin, Interregional and International Trade, rev. ed. (Cambridge: Harvard University Press, 1967).
Wassily W. Leontief, "Domestic Production and Foreign Trade, The American Capital Position Re-examined," Proceedings of the American Philosophical Society 98 (September, 1953), pp. 332-349.
Jagdish Bhagwati, "The Pure Theory of International Trade: A Survey," Eco- nomic Journal 74 (March, 1964), pp. 1-84,

G. C. Hufbauer, "The Import of National Characteristics and Technol- ogy on the Commodity Composition of Trade in Manufactured Goods," in Raymond Vernon, ed., The Technology Factor in International Trade, National Bureau of Economic Research (New York: Columbia University Press, 1970);
John F. Morrall, III, Human Capital Technology and the Role of the United States in Inter- national Trade (Gainesville: University of Florida Press, 1972).
Leontief, op. cit.;
Bhagwati, op. cit.;
P. B. Kenen, "Nature, Capital and Trade,' 'Journal of Political Economy 73 (December, 1965), pp. 437-460.
Robert E. Baldwin, "Determinants of the Commodity Structure of U.S. Trade: Reply," American Economic Review 62 (June, 1972), p. 465;
Morrall, op. cit.
John R. Moroney and James M. Walker, "A Regional Test of the Heckscher- Ohlin Hypothesis," Journal of Political Economy 74 (December, 1966), pp. 573-586.
Edwin F. Estle, "A More Conclusive Regional Test of the Heckscher-Ohlin Hypothesis," Journal of Political Economy 75 (December, 1967), pp. 886-888.
Y. Horiba, "Factor Proportions and the Structure of Interregional Trade: The Case of Japan," Southern Economic Journal 39 (January, 1973), pp. 381-388.
Leontief, op. cit.,
"Factor Proportions and the Structure of American Trade: Further Theoretical and Empirical Analysis," Review of Economics and Statistics 38 (September, 1956), pp. 386-407.
U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census, 1958 United States Census of Manufactures, vols. I and II.

Daniel Creamer, Sergei P. Dobrovolsky, and Israel Borenstein, Capital in Manu- facturing and Mining, Its Formation and Financing, A Study by the National Bureau of Economic Research (Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1960).
Lowell Galloway, "Regional Capital Estimates by Industry, 1954-57," Southern Economic Journal 24 (July, 1962), pp. 21-25;

C. E. Ferguson, "The Elasticity of Substitution and Regional Estimates of Capital and Capital Ratios in American Manufacturing Industry, 1954-1958," in Melvin L. Greenhut and W. Tate Whitman, eds., Essays in Southern Economic Development (Chapel Hill: University of North Carolina Press, 1964).
U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census, op. cit.
Zvi Griliches, "Production Functions in Manufacturing: Some Additional Re- sults," Southern Economic Journal 35 (October, 1968), p. 154.
U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census, op. cit.
U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census, United States Census of Population: I960, vol. I.
Griliches, op. cit., p. 152.
Estle, op. cit.
